meanings.sent1: The punctuators in the class helped their friends with grammar.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the punctuators to check the punctuation in the essay.
meanings.sent3: The punctuators at the writing club were known for their attention to detail.
meanings.sent4: She was like a punctuator in the conversation, adding clarity to every sentence.
meanings.sent5: The diligent punctuators made sure every comma and period was in its place.

meanings.definition: Marks used in writing to separate sentences and clarify meaning.
meanings.sent1: The book had clear punctuators that made it easy to read.
meanings.sent2: Commas and periods are common punctuators in English writing.
meanings.sent3: The missing punctuators in the text made it confusing to understand.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright punctuator in the dull room.
meanings.sent5: The punctuators acted as signposts guiding the reader through the text.
